New Records: Babar Azam equals Virat Kohli's world record during Pakistan's 1st T20I against Ireland
Key Match Events: Ireland beat Pakistan by 5 wickets in 1st T20I to take 1-0 lead in 3-match series
Pre-Game Insights: Pakistan will face Ireland in the 2nd T20I on Sunday (May 12), and the match is a must-win for the Men in Green.
Mohammad Amir is likely to play for Pakistan in the second fixture, and Usman Khan is expected to get preference over Azam Khan.
Ireland would like to get the better of Babar Azam & Co. once again and script history.
Post-Match Reflections: The Men in Green can't afford to lose another match on Sunday.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The 2nd T20I between Pakistan and Ireland will have live streaming available on the FanCode app and website.
Fans need to have a subscription to watch the match.
Others: The match is scheduled to take place at Clontarf Cricket Club Ground in Dublin.
The second T20I of the ongoing three-match series between Pakistan and Ireland will start at 07:30 p.m. IST.
